content: knitted drops top with lace pattern and raglan in belle worked top down drops extra 0-1104 drops design pattern no vs-003 yarn group b size s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl materials drops belle from garnstudio 300-350-350-400-450-500 g color no 02 off white drops double pointed needles and circular needle 60 and 80 cm / 24 and 32 size 4 mm/us 6 - or size needed to get 21 sts x 28 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm drops double pointed needles and circular needle 60 and 80 cm / 24 and 32 size 3 5 mm/us 4 - for edge in garter st worked in the round on circular needle top down
